title: Weird crackle noise when I play League
body:
Hi, I recentrly bought a brand new computer, ( a gaming computer, MSI Brand) and when I play league, sometimes I get a very annoying  and loud crackle noise. I'm not too good with computers, so I don't know what to do to fix it, but I noticed that the sound only occurs when playing league ( it doesn't occur when I play Overwatch or when I watch videos on the web as an exemple)

Can you help me?

Thank you

replies.body: Does the noise happen during specific events, abilities, or during certain audio playing beforehand? I'd like you to try [performing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to see if any background apps are causing the issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nGasaKN0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-12T22:14:21.633+0000)
>
> Does the noise happen during specific events, abilities, or during certain audio playing beforehand? I'd like you to try [performing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to see if any background apps are causing the issue.

Hi again, I also tried to repair the installation, but now I'm having new problems.. When I start a game, the screen freezes then my computer too and there's nothing I can do except to restart my computer ! Honestly I have no idea what's going on. I'm going to send you a log, can you explain me how to do it ?

ty

The freezing issue is likely caused by the Windows 10 Aniversary update that enabled Game DVR inside the Xbox Game Bar app. I suggest [disabling the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) as a quick check to see if this is true.

As for your continuing crackling problem, I recommend updating your system drivers, specifically your audio drivers off of [MSI's service page.](https://us.msi.com/service/download/)

Let me know if either of those steps helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nGasaKN0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-12T22:14:21.633+0000)
>
> Does the noise happen during specific events, abilities, or during certain audio playing beforehand? I'd like you to try [performing a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to see if any background apps are causing the issue.

Hi Targon Blade, I did perform a clean boot like you told me... it didn't fix the problem. What else should i do
